original_text: Moses, Eleazar the priest and all the leaders of the people were standing at the front of the Tent of Meeting. Zelophehad's daughters said to them,
korean_text: 그들이 회막 문에서 모세와 제사장 엘르아살과 지휘관들과 온 회중 앞에 서서 이르되

sentences.original_text: and all the leaders of the people
were standing at the front of the Tent of Meeting
